title: Prompt Execution Log Schema
description: Standard trace log format for prompt runs. Used for telemetry, cost tracking, and debugging.

prompt_id.description: Unique ID or name of the prompt being executed

version_hash.description: Hash of the prompt content (e.g. SHA256) for immutability and diff tracking

trace_id.description: Unique identifier for the full execution trace (spans agent chains, retries, etc.)

model.description: LLM used for this prompt (e.g. gpt-4, claude-3, mixtral)

tokens_input.description: Number of tokens in the prompt input

tokens_output.description: Number of tokens in the model output

cost_usd.description: Estimated cost in USD for this prompt run (tokens Ã— rate)

inputs.description: Object representing the structured prompt input fields

retrieved_docs.description: Optional array of RAG documents retrieved before generation

outputs.description: Object containing raw model output, possibly with metadata

duration_ms.description: Optional model response time in milliseconds

run_id.description: Optional identifier used for linking to frontend observability dashboards
